session.goal: Add Dev Intelligence Dashboard — live project tracker for 5 GitHub repos under Intelligence section

changes.summary: Added Dev Intelligence Dashboard page with live GitHub API integration tracking 5 repos (titan-trinity-core, maple-docs, maple-underwriter, maple-360, daily-progress-tracker). Shows branch health, milestones, PRs, session status, and North Star per project with 60-second auto-refresh.
files_modified: src/store/devProjectsStore.ts (NEW — Zustand store for project data)
src/pages/DevProjectsPage.tsx (NEW — page shell with summary bar + grid)
src/types/sidebar.ts (MOD — added nav-dev-projects to Intelligence section)
src/App.tsx (MOD — added lazy import + route for /dev-projects)
decisions_made: GitHub REST API called directly from browser (supports CORS with PAT auth) — no proxy needed
VITE_GITHUB_PAT env var for auth (local-only dev tool, acceptable security)
60-second auto-refresh interval (30 API calls per refresh, 1800/hour well within 5000 limit)
Page route /dev-projects under Intelligence sidebar section
Fetches 6 data points per repo: branches, PRs, NORTH_STAR.md, MILESTONES.md, HANDOFF.md, latest commit
Branch health: green=2 branches (governance model), red≠2

next_immediate_step.details: User needs to add their GitHub PAT with repo scope to .env for the dashboard to fetch private repo data

next_three_steps: Test the live dashboard on localhost with VITE_GITHUB_PAT configured
Consider adding per-project refresh and click-to-navigate to specific pages
Wire Trading card to existing /trading page, consider adding project-specific deep links
continuation.context_notes: 686 tests pass across 54 files. Clean production build. 4 new files created, 4 existing files modified. Feature adds ~460 LOC.
